Text: MergerHello I feel like I am in a bad dream and when I wake up all this merger stuff will be a joke Why Dynegy The culture is so different I had the opportunity to work for Dynegy and there where many racial and uncomfortable events that happen for many employees We lost our name with this Merger as well as the pride I truly believe another solution will come to surface Hopes and Prays can developed us all from this disappointment Thanks

FW Invitation to Town Hall MeetingPST Please pass on Original Message From Tangie Dykes mailto Sent Wednesday January AM To Johnson Alice Shepherd Marsha Downey Patricia Daily Leonard Woodson Harry Carter Pamela Subject Fw Invitation to Town Hall Meeting Attached you will find directions to the town hall meeting Original Message From Dorita Hatchet To Cc Sent Tuesday January PM Subject Invitation to Town Hall Meeting

FW We made the big timePST Original Message From Moses Cassy Sent Thursday January PM To Robinson Rhonda Williams Bridget Shepherd Marsha Wynne Rita Subject FW We made the big time This is to funny Original Message From Nieves Angela Sent Thursday January PM To Moses Cassy Hart Reginald Diza Alain Subject FW We made the big time Original Message From Longoria Jennifer K Sent Thursday January PM To Staub Ryan Nieves Angela Subject FW We made the big time Original Message From Mottu Norma Sent Thursday January AM To Longoria Jennifer K Subject FW We made the big time Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Thursday January AM To Mottu Norma Hensch Richard Digges Christina Subject FW We made the big time Original Message From Phil Krueger mailto Sent Thursday January AM To Jameson Lance Subject FW We made the big time Phil Krueger H M Employ your time improving yourself by other mens writings so that you shall come easily by what others have labored hard for Socrates Original Message From Pieronek Ron mailtoRon NRONcom Sent Thursday January AM Subject We made the big time This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
